title: Senior Software Developer
description:
Senior Software Developer (Contract Basis)

Company Overview:
SNT Consulting simplifies the technical landscape and amplifies productivity for businesses. As your trusted Technical Concierge, we provide personalized guidance through the complexities of technology. Unlike traditional consultants, we work closely with you to understand your goals, crafting customized solutions that streamline processes and enhance user experiences. From comprehensive technology audits to bespoke app and software development, we're dedicated to empowering your business to thrive in the digital age. Let's simplify your tech journey together and unlock your full potential!

Position Overview:
We are seeking a highly skilled and motivated Senior Software Developer to collaborate with our dynamic team on a project basis. This position will play a crucial role in building innovative software, websites, mobile applications, and ensuring they meet high standards of security and performance. You will be involved in all stages of the Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC), working closely with both local and offshore development teams.

Key Responsibilities:
-	Develop secured financial applications and web-based solutions throughout the SDLC, including solution design, development, implementation, and production support.
-	Lead requirements gathering, analysis, design, coding, testing, and maintenance phases of software product development.
-	Assist in the migration from legacy technologies to modern solutions, making recommendations on the best approaches.
-	Collaborate effectively with local and offshore development teams to design and implement technical solutions.
-	Hands-on resolution of issues and handling unexpected development requests as needed.
-	Publish applications to QA and production environments.
-	Monitor the performance of existing web applications using available tools in the market.
-	Continuously enhance your skill set by learning and exploring new technologies and methodologies.
-	Demonstrate analytical thinking, strong problem-solving skills, and a drive for results.
-	Actively participate in cross-departmental discussions to improve the quality of our solutions.
-	Work on integrating with secured third-party applications.
Qualifications:
-	Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field 
-	3+ years of experience in software development, with a focus on web and mobile applications.
-	Proficiency in React, Java, SQL, AWS, Agile Framework
-	Strong understanding of the Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC) and experience leading projects from inception to deployment.
-	Experience with CRM applications and creating business efficiencies and automations is highly desirable.
-	Excellent communication skills and the ability to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams.
-	Proven track record of continuous learning and adapting to new technologies.
-	Ability to thrive in a fast-paced, dynamic environment and manage multiple priorities effectively.
